content.detailedDescription:
My daughter had dance practice and we all decided to go to town and get some coldstone and watch her practice.  we left and headed south on cr 45 and then turned left on cr 44.  we went up over the first rise and my wife saw what appeared to be two separate crafts that seemed to be going very slowly from east to west and very close to each other.  my children 12 and 5 became very frightened mostly due to my wife over reacting to whatever we were seeing. but, i really wanted to pull over and look and listen.  when i pulled the car over and was able to turn around and look i noticed that one of the things was gone.  i asked my wife to look and she saw the same thing.  our house was about a mile away and i quickly took everyone home, ran in the house and grabbed our camera and quickly drove back to the site.  nothing there.  

then i see two very large airplanes headed west to east in formation going towards the north side of south long lake.  they went about as far as the lake and made a hard turn back the way they came and went directly over my house like they were searching for something. not uncommon for military planes and helicopters as we live about 15-20 miles from a base,  but never this low.


i never felt a great deal of fear, mostly excitement because i had seen these light/crafts once before about 2 years ago and everyone thought i was nuts.  when my wife saw them she said she felt the same not really scared just excited.  kids were quite scared and did not really know what to think.

my father, grandfather, great-grandfather, aunt and uncle are all pilots, two active captains for major carriers.  i have flown all over in all different aircraft and i have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Two separate crafts in formation over cr 44, 6 miles south of brainerd.

content.detailedDescription:
This was dictated to me by my mother quickly over the phone. she is visiting our elderly great-grandmother down in port charlotte, florida.


at around 9:00 pm during a bad storm, two large orange triangle shaped objects were seen flying erratically over the harbor, they were sighted looking south towards the city of punta gorda, they moved in very odd fashions which would be impossible for airplanes to replicate. she was talking to her grandmother and i suppose casually looked over towards the harbor and saw these two very large orange triangular shaped objects, i'm not sure what she may have thought they were at first but they amazed her and she felt shocked at what she was seeing. she lost sight when i called to talk to her.
content.summary: 2 large triangle shaped objects flying over charlotte harbor.

content.detailedDescription:
Http://www.Nuforc.Org/webreports/068/s68023.Html

i live southeast of gettysburg. we are close to camp david and fort dietrich in fredrick md and fort ritchie maybe. my landlord, who recently passed away has a son who is a state police officer. he too saw the same 2 ships and said they were military planes this past thurs., 4/9.

ok, i cant sleep. maybe im a bit crazy but i have a prior experience. i was in no more then 2nd grade, lived in a apt complex in cockeysville md. one night i was outside the apt building playing with the locals. at one point, the sky was filled w/ 2 v shapes of light, point out front w/ lights fanning out like wings. they dominated the sky and passed so incredibly fast, i cant recall any sound relating to the incident tho i vividly recall going inside to relate my tale of ufo`s to my family (picked up from adult locals that night), which of course i was dismissed. a friend attributes it to stealth fighters, do they make sounds while directly over head? i recall seeing alien at the drive-in close to my apt at this time and being absolutely whacked. it must have been 78 or 79, that movie scared me tho i dont recall if it was post or pre the lights in the sky. i feel like it was post but meh it was so long ago and im already questioning how much the history channel has affected my memory.

last thurs night, the cupboard was bare, it was time to go shopping. it was after 9pm and i headed off to the store. as i approached the t intersection i needed to make a right at, i saw over the hill line a bunch of lights in the sky, hovering. i immediately flipped out, trying to reason what i was seeing.

i continued on, it was 2 sets of 4 bright white horizontal lights. one set seemed parallel to the ground, the second set of 4 off to its right were askew, perhaps behind the first set. i reasoned it had to be some sort of suspended lights over the farm, but why?

i made the right, headed still towards the store. the 2 sets of 4 lights were hovering over the farm to my left, which was completely dark. at this point it didnt seem to be suspended lights. i was contemplating on driving into the driveway of the farm to knock on the door when i noticed a car coming the other direction.

i sorta decided to pull into the driveway tho i turned early because as soon as i made the move to the house, the lights made for my direction. it happened so fast, i was a bit short of the driveway so i just pulled a big u in the middle of the road, prior to the oncoming car.

i had all these crazy thoughts, these lights were definitely coming my way, i ran the stop sign headed back to my house. up the road a bit i noticed the car behind me had turned in my direction as had the 2 ships(?) above and to my left. i was wired and scared {pd}, i was actually out front of my landlords other son`s new property, so i pulled over and got out.

the car behind me pulled up as the 2 ships flew over. the 4 bright white lights that dominated the front were not seen as they flew overhead. it appeared to be a plane shape, had a light blue glow and some standard looking (?) red lights. i cant say i got a great look at them, i was sort of freaking out and approaching the car behind me who was equally freaked out due to my driving.

i asked them if they saw the planes (?), and as i did, i heard what was like a humming sound as if perhaps these were 2 auto-lite type ships were being used to spotlight deer or property. i was thinking bi-wing plane of sorts w/ the 4 big white lights between the wings but hell originally i thought the farm was being demolished at night and the lights were suspended for the work.

they continued on in the opposite way of the store, which now seemed like an even better destination place. the two young guys in the car were like "holy {pd} what are those" and i said, "i hear a engine of sorts so must be some sort of plane", to which they agreed. i got in my car, took off back towards the store, seeing them seem to split up as i lost them in my line of sight. as far as i know, the 2 young guys followed the 2 planes.

ive spoke w/ the farm owner today and he believes what i saw was c130`s. he says they do a training run 4 or 5 times a year and was able to describe the path of the planes almost perfectly. ive looked online but cannot find any pictures of c130`s w/ the white lights. ive found plenty of c130`s, just none that made me think thats what i saw.
content.summary: 2 sets of 4 bright white lights appeared to be hovering.

content.detailedDescription: Well some time around 9 pm my mother returned home from a sweatlodge ceremony and she was saying "come on kids get in the car we seen lights in the sky by spring creek jct. !" so me and my mother and three younger siblings got in the car and we drove aprox. 3-4 miles south of st. francis and as we came to the top of a hill we noticed these bright lights just above the tree tops a 1/4 miles from where we parked. the lights lit up the area below like big giant flood lights about 20-25 light in a circle and above the we could see a very large dome shaped object. as we watched it the lights began pulsate and change color from white to purple to blue and to yellow then they started spining in a circle. there was a road about 100 yards in front of the object that i wanted my mom to go and drive down so we could get a closer look, but as she was about to drive closer my younger siblings began to freak out and started crying saying"no mom dont go down there its gonna take us!" so she turned the car around and headed back for town. we watched the object for about 15 minutes and as we were leaving i watched the object till it was no longer in view.
content.summary: Large dome shaped object with lights on the bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
Seen light in the sky around 10 miles away (roughly speaking)..Over guildford way from dorking.
went out side after 5 mins was still there. got a pair of binoculars looked and with these it went from a redish ligh to white green red and violet light which pulsated different lights.
culd not take a picture my camera was not god enought to pick up the light.
got my mum too look and she could not explain and my girlfriend who has a licence to fly 2 seat aircraft and she said that it was nothing she had seen before.(she is by no way a expert but if tere is a good witness goodcoming from her)
 
after i went to bed got up around 1045 ish cant be accurate about thistime and it had gone.

there is gatwick air port near me and plenty of aircraft around the area at the time. severalhelicopters too. as they flew by this object it was nothing like the lights or shapes that aircraft make in he air.

if you look on you tube for light over guildford from 2007 ish and farnborough it was very much like that. only that i dont think a camera can pick up the colours in such definition that i did with eye goggles!!
content.summary: 4 lights in a ball pulsing in same spot for over an hour.

content.detailedDescription: i had just driven through the toll booth for the outerbridge crossing, so heading ene, and heading towards what used to be called the richmond parkway, when i saw them -- four blueish things flying  in formation.  at first i thought they were birds, but they were too big and flying too fast, and no wings.  then i thought maybe they were the blue angels, but again these things didn't have wings, appeared smaller, there was no smoke, and no sound or vibration.  they came in from the east and turned and went north.  the objects moved smoothly and were quickly out of sight.  from the highway there is good visibility and there is wide panoramic view.  when i say blueish, it was sort of a hazy atmospheric blue, the way mountains can look in the distance. the shape was sort of bulbous, with one side being a bit more pointed.  the formation was not perfect, but they maintained it in the turn.  again, they were flying very fast.  this was maybe a quarter of a mile in front of me, and not that high up.  lower than most planes fly.  when i looked at my clock it was a few minutes later and it said 7:11 pm.  also, i think that clock might be a few minutes slow. i don't drink or use drugs.  i didn't feel afraid, just curious.  thought it must be fun to bop along so fast.
content.summary: 4 bluish bulbous ufos in formation near outerbridge crossing, staten island, ny  (nyc).

content.detailedDescription: I don't believe this to be extraterrestrial in nature (however that would be awesome if it was) however, myself and 3 others were outside smoking and noticed a burning object heading west.  it appeared to be a fireball with an 'arm' waving around it.  it was moving slowly across the sky at about 500 feet.  it stopped at one point and seemed to spin around several times and then moved in a northerly direction.  after awhile something started falling off of it, like pieces of it were burning and dropping off.  it eventually, slowly however, moved to the north and disappeared behind a cloud.  our guesses were a hot air balloon (but why would it be out this late at night), a blimp, weather balloon, etc., but it seemed to be too low to the ground and again, if it was on fire, why are there no other reports of it at this point?  i hope someone can get to the bottom of this.  we contacted 911 believing that there was an aircraft of sorts in trouble but it was gone by the time they arrived and they left without incident.  i can't find anything on local papers or news websites that are updated frequently.  has anyone else reported anything?  was there some sort of an accident or did we in fact maybe witness something 'otherworldly'?
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Blimp,  Circle,  Cylinder,  Disc,  Fireball,  Star-like
content.summary: Burning object in the sky.
Cigar shaped cloud.

content.detailedDescription: These orb-like objects seem to be the same as the others. the go in out of clouds and move across the screen at a high rate of speed.
content.summary: Small fast dark objects.

content.detailedDescription: I always take my camera with me cause the first sighting i had i did not having one.I been saving ufo photos and other video i have,and just posted it all on my blog worldufospace yesterday.A friend of mine who live near me came over cause he kept saying he see's ufos every night,and we set up to film tonight.Not 30 mins into watching the sky a bright object appeared in the south at high altitude,and moving fast,so i got the camcorder,and he grabbed the big spotlight i started filming it flying stright from south to north.When he shined the spotlight at it,it made a 90 degree turn left to go out over the gulf.We filmed it till it went out of view,it look to blink out.I don't have the right wire to upload the footage stright from my camcorder so i had to hook it up to the t.V. and film the t.V. with my little camera.We started watching about 8pm till 10:10 pm and seen a total of six,or seven objects, most were not bright enough to pick up with camcorder,but i did film them so they could be pulled out maybe.I checked the space station tracker,and nasa j tracker and the space station,or satellites were not over us at all the time we were out there.The object were not all going the same way,a few went north to south,or east to west.If anyone has any questions or if you seen the same thing you can contact me at my blog worldufospace.Blogspot.Com. the video can also be seen by going to this link http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=alnbzsnxpue
content.summary: Ufo filmed in englewood, florida on the gulf of mexico.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my back yard filming with my sony ir camera. took a minute to view the sky with my eye's instead of through the view finder and noticed n object in the sky, switched camera to normal mode and filmed for about 13 seconds until the disc shape disapperaed. about 5-7 minutes prior to filming the disc, i had to circular objects pass over my house that showed up on my video in ir mode however i was able to see them with the naked eye, only the camera was able to pick them up. i have several other videos of ufo's, just learning how to edit my footage.
content.summary: Disc shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: I am here to tell the truth . ken pfeifer just called me . look every other night i see orange balls or triangles or disc shape ufos just siting there at 11 pm every other night . sometimes they take out the towns electric . on {pid} pittsgrove nj 08318 . i see these {pd} things right in front of green branch park . hovering . no joke i got some stuff on my cam . but i am scared of this {pd} .
content.summary: This {pd} thing sits there for 10 minutes with so many lights weird {pd}.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
 
i think there's a ufo in this photo? i was over in honolulu, hawaii in feb with my wife
we went out for lunch and sat outdoors. there were clouds were out that day, other wise it was a nice day out,so i was taking pictures all that day. i was going through the pictures today and i noticed a small black object in the upper right hand side. i enlarged the picture
the best i could do, and i don't know what it is,it looks like a eye to me it's not a plane or a helicopter. ( i drew a black circle around it )
so what is it? look forward for your answer.
 
regards
patrick conley
san diego, ca
content.summary: Did not notice anything until i checked my pictures when i got home.

content.detailedDescription: Driving up hwy 665, about .25 miles from the hwy 55 intersection.  i looked north east towards new orleans and saw something that looked like a flare but larger and slower.  i looked for an aircraft but didn't see any.  the duration was a lot longer than a arieal flare.  this is cliche, but as soon as i picked up my phone to call my wife, after the first ring it disapeared.  my feeling at the time was excitement.
content.summary: Bright red/orange flame with smoke trail smaller than object.

content.detailedDescription:
My family was going outside to get into the car when they spotted this object flying very slowly over the horizon. we immediately grabbed the camera and snapped as many pictures as possible. have a few more as i was typing this. i got a few more close ups.
please contact me if you want to see the rest of the pictures i have downloaded.
thanks, 
carol
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unknown flying object found hovering over horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
On easter sunday, april 12, 2009, i was sitting out front of the caffe trieste having a cappucino, in san francisco's north beach district. the location was 601 vallejo street, at the corner of vallejo street and grant avenue.  my attention was drawn to one of the caffe trieste employees who was standing at the corner excitedly pointing up at the sky to a woman standing next to him. i got up and walked over to them and asked them what they were looking at.

they pointed out a roughly circular object hovering in the evening sky.  the time was exactly 5:40 pm, pst. i happened to have a compass in my laptop bag and quickly determined the azimuth to be 90 degrees due east. later, using a simple protractor based inclinometer, i determined the angular elevation to be approximately 60 degrees plus or minus 5 degrees. 

the weather at the time of the sighting was clear, with some high altitude cirrus clouds.  the wind direction and speed, according to the national weather service website at the time, was west to northwest, 7-10 knots, with gusts exceeding 15 knots.

the object's angular size was approximately 1/4 full moon.  it had a roughly circular shape.  the color was a muted white, and it was clearly illuminated by the setting sun.  the object did not appear to be illuminated from within, however. the object was completely silent and did not resemble any type of aircraft i'm familiar with.

the object hovered in one position for a minute or so, before slowly moving in a southerly direction -- perpendicular to the direction of the brisk prevailing winds. as the object began to move it also began to change shape.  it formed a rough triangle, and then became more of a rectangle.  the other witness and i were loudly commenting on this shape change, when the object changed back into it's original circular shape. the object then appeared to recede, as though gaining altitude, while slowly moving to the south to approximately 110 degrees east southeast, whereupon it simply faded from view.

i turned another caffe trieste employee who had also been watching the object, and asked him what he thought he saw.  at that moment, the first caffe trieste employee, who originally saw the object, exclaimed "there's another one!" the time was exactly 5:48 pm, pst.

this second object was smaller, approximately 1/10 full moon in angular size and appeared in almost the identical 90 degrees azimuth as the first object.  but the second object's angular elevation as considerably higher, approximately 80 degrees, plus or minus five degrees.  this object hovered for about one minute before slowly moving to south and receding from view as if gaining altitude -- just as the previous object did -- until it was no longer visible to the naked eye.

at this point there were a number people standing at the corner discussing what they had seen.  i asked the first witness how he initially sighted the object.  he said he'd been standing outside talking to a woman, when he noticed an object moving rapidly from the west to the east, when the object suddenly stopped and hovered.  that's when he began pointing up at the object, and when i noticed and came over to see what they were looking up at. 

at that moment, a man sitting in his pickup truck across the street yelled
"there's another one!"  the time was exactly 6:05 pm, pst. this third object was identical in angular size to the second object, 1/10 a full moon. it's azimuth was approximately 130 degree east southeast, and it's angular elevation approximately 80 degrees, plus or minus five degrees.  this object was only visible for around 30 seconds before it rapidly receded from view, again as if gaining altitude.

the entire incident spanned approximately 25 minutes. it was unfortunate that none of the customers sitting outside had cameras, nor were there any binoculars conveniently around.  i immediately asked four of the witnesses if they would be willing to be interviewed about what they had witnessed. i am currently in the process of setting up these interviews.  three of the witnesses said they would have no problem recording the interview on video, while the fourth witness said he would consent to an audio interview.

i was a combat photographer in the us navy during the vietnam war, and have extensive experience in identifying both private, commercial, and military aircraft.  these three objects were clearly not aircraft of any type i'm familiar with. my immediate reaction when i initially saw the first object begin changing shapes, is that it had to be some kind of weather balloon, or balloon cluster.  but after carefully observing the object alter its shape, i came to the preliminary conclusion that it was not a balloon or cluster of balloons.  i based that preliminary conclusion on the fact that the wind was blowing steadily from the west to northwest, and these objects both hovered and moved perpendicular to the direction of the wind. i still cannot rationally explain what i witnessed.

it should be added that i am personally acquainted with all four of the witnesses, just in case this might impact my conducting a completely objective investigation.
content.summary: Three objects sighted hovering in the evening sky.  one of the objects appeared to change shape.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend(who will corroborate the event) we driving eastbound on wells branch parkway about to get on n i-35, pulled to a stop at the light of the overpass and saw a bright white circular object moving very fast towards the ground. the was no tail, it was circular in shape, and look to me like some sort or continuous electrical spark. there was light blue and white. no orange, red, or yellow or any color to indicate a flame or combustion. it went overhead very fast in a northeasterly direction and appeared to be falling, or crashing. we continued on the highway, but could see no smoke, flames, or fire. me and my buddy could not figure out what it was based on the event alone. we kept and eye and ear open for any news on what happened. but have not heard anything since.
content.summary: Ufo falling/crashing in north austin

content.detailedDescription: i was looking up in the sky one morning while i was doing some work outside at a house by mine and i looked up and saw this weird contrail from a jet. i decided to try out my new camera and take several pics of the contrail. later that day i went home and zoomed in and noticed there was an object next to the contrail in one of the pics.
content.summary: Ufo next to contrail.

content.detailedDescription:
While reviewing my photos taken during a recent photo trip, i noticed a strange object in one of my photos.  it looks like a somewhat transparent worm with spiral wings in an area of the sky.  i took a few bracketed images and the object does not appear on the others.  not really a believer but it sure is strange.  i remember seeing something similar in a discovery channel ufo special once, so i thought you would like to know about it.  the funny thing is that whatever it is, it is flying over the oregon state capitol building.  

i lowered the quality of the original to prevent theft but i have the original high res jpeg as well as the original nikon raw image.  neither image has had any digital manipulation.  i did crop the image that i sent to you to narrow the area you have to search for the object.  you should be able to find the image in the upper left area of the sky near the edge of the flowering cherry tree.  i origially thought that i may be some sort of insect in flight but the wind was blowing and the flowering cherry shows very little wind movement so my shutter speed was fairly high.

let me know what you think

tracy fox
content.summary: Strange object on a photo over state capital building.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a chiar watching tv when i notivced a light outside. i know that their are planes in the area and i know the light patterns of planes and ahelicopters at night but i didn't recongize this type. i went out side and the first thing that i notice is that i heard nothing. what i first thought was a plane was going maybe 80-90 mph because of how slow it was going over the tree feild very low to the horizion. i can judge the distance of the object cause of how far apart the lights were and the angle of them changed at it drew closer to me. i have heard jets at night and airplanes and helicopters. everything in the valley makes a sound and it can travel a great distance. the object was low on the horizion and it passed right by me. the object moved slowly across the sky, it seemed like it was floating, i flt very weird at that moment. i could not recongize what the object was. i felt a warm feeling in my body as i watched it go by me. it seemed to be very close. i felt like something was watching me at that moment. i listened again for a sound for a hint on what it might be but their was no sound what so ever. nothing was outside and nothing was moving so if the object did have a prop or a turbine i would of heard it. it went out of my site heading towards the road. i then ran to the other side of the house to the front door and saw it climb rapidly and ascend to a high alitude and circle around the house. it must of triples the alitude from before and then again i felt like it was watching me. i the then disappeared out of my site either it teleported ot the lights turned off. but either way it did not act like any aircraft that i seen before.
content.summary: One red light lead and three white light in a dimond shape all together.

content.detailedDescription:
Although i can't even tell you exactly what year it was, i believe that i have witnessed one of the most amazing sightings in history! 

my mom was driving about to pull into our driveway when a neighbor stopped us yelling"susan get out of the car, you gotta see this!" we pulled over in the street next to our driveway and unbelievably there was a flying saucer hovering right over another neighbor's house. it was low enough and light enough with the snow covered ground to dismiss this for anything but an actual ufo probably from another world. i concede that there are many possibilities including a time travel ship or a craft from deep under water or a possible military experiment but my gut tells me visitors! 

there was no sound at all and it stayed in one spot for about 15 minutes barely moving. my mom told me to get my father to get a camera or video but he was watching something on tv and thought i was making it up. (unforgivable!) so tragically  we got nothing except our memories. the craft zipped about a quarter mile south and hovered there for a while (still very visible). after a while the craft started slowly moving back towards me until it stopped and hovered over our next door neighbor's yard. when it appeared to start descending, i ran and hid behind my couch not wanting to meet the "whatevers".

there's of course more details and more witnesses to this event but i'm not big into typing so, if anyone wishes to interview me, give me a polygraph or anything else, i'm happy to do anything that might help me shed some light on what we might've seen.

for over 30 years i've been relatively silent about this and it's been haunting me so i've made a video and photo simulation to help me see once again what's been puzzling me for most of my life.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have created a simulation of this extraordinary event.

content.detailedDescription:
Sweeping the deck, heard a faint humming noise off to my right.  went to check it out and i saw what i described above.  the odd thing about it was that it was so huge but was hardly moving.  i called 911 - i don't think they believed me and i had my husband come out to take a look.  we watched it for quite  awhile then just went back inside.  it was still there when i looked out to see if it was gone.  i didn't know what to think of it or i would have taken a picture. we just kept trying to figure out what it was. we think it may be something from the government or a practice run for some new airplane.  who knows.

all i know is that is was huge and flying very low and very still.  it was black, triangular in shape and hummend.  the lights were not symetrical in placement- 2 on the left and 3 on the right. we live in the country and it was just about at the level of some trees on the hill so it was hanging very low.  

could you shed some light?  really interested in your thoughts.  

thanks,

teri rounds
content.summary: Very low, almost noisless, hovering moving very slowly, black shaped like a triangle with 5 lights on the back.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i and another couple were returning from dinner at trattoria lisina restaurant in driftwood, texas.  we were on fm 1826 just south of its intersection with highway 45.  at 11:10 pm my friend in the back seat of the car said "hey, there is a ufo."  i immediately pulled the car over onto the grass.  including myself, there were four observers of this phenomenon- the others were my wife and the couple accompanying us in our vehicle.

the sky was low overcast.  there was a circular donut-shaped light (with a fluorescent-like quality or color temperature) that could be seen rising from lower on the horizon about rooftop level with the houses to a position about 75 to 85 degrees up.  it would twist and turn almost kite-like, then disappear only to immediately reappear low on the horizon again.  my best guess is that it was about 600 to 1000 yards distant.  as it rose into the sky, it made a tesla coil-like sound that varied with the brightness of the object.  as the object would rise and get brighter, the sound would intensify, its loudness being directly proportional to the brightness of the object.  what appeared to be a second trailing light would intermittently discharge about every thirty seconds or so, always a uniform distance below and to the left of the donut-shaped circle of light.  i did not notice the red light until about five minutes into the sighting. [witness later stated that the red flash was "very ruby red"] the light appeared to the east southeast of our position.  it appeared to rise and mix into the clouds which seemed to partially obscure the light/object/craft. as whatever it was rose into the air, it seemed to maintain a more or less uniform distance from us as though it was pivoting about our position.

after about 10 minutes, it disappeared low on the horizon and did not reappear.  we then left.  i took photos with my iphone but all they show is a pinpoint of light in the sky.

after we arrived at our house and our guests left for their home, i returned to the site and drove through the neighborhood looking for signs of whatever it was that we had observed with no success.
content.summary: White donut-shaped light in the sky with intermittent red light discharge accompanied by crackling "tesla coil-like" sound that varied in loudness with the brightness of the object.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving on us 60 to  take my daughter to the kids museum and it was lighting and the clouds were very pretty.  i do photography on the side and like to take pictures of the sky sometimes.  so as we were driving i started snapping photos.  i did not notice the object until i was looking at the pictures later. when i first noticed the object in the photo i was not sure what it was i thought ufo, but of course you always try and talk yourself out of these things.  but i just don't know what else it could be.  i noticed in one photo there is a red light coming down from the object.  my feelings were i was excited but still am trying to find some other explanation for this.   but i really feel this is what it is.
content.summary: I was just taking pictures of the sky as we were driving down the road and noticed them afterwards.

content.detailedDescription: This event was too long and disturbing to write down in this manner. please contact me for further info. this event still keeps me awake at night many years later! e-mail contact, at this time, only.
content.summary: Contact of the third kind (visual and telephathic).

content.detailedDescription:
Got out of the car in my parking lot and was walking to my apt. looked up to see the beautiful night sky which filled with high, puffy clouds that were reflecting the moon and i could see a few stars here and there.

my eyes quickly fell upon the typical ���spycraft��� triangle ufo. i knew it wasn���t a plane, although at first i thought it was because it had flashing lights like one. one light was white, the other red, and the other blue if i remember right.

i haven���t a clue how high up it was but it seemed a bit higher than the clouds and seemed small from a distance, and it was moving about as fast as a plane. no engine sounds although that didn���t surprise me at all considering the height it appeared to be at.

my assumption it was one of those spyplane things. why it had flashing, blaring lights though when it���s supposed to be spying is beyond me! but that���s what i think it may have been as we have an air force base nearby.
content.summary: Triangle ufo, red blue & white lights in corners & a blinking light in middle.

content.detailedDescription:
Got out of the car in my parking lot and was walking to my apt. looked up to see the beautiful night sky which filled with high, puffy clouds that were reflecting the moon and i could see a few stars here and there.

my eyes quickly fell upon what seemed to be a classic ���spycraft��� triangle ufo. i quickly discerned it wasn���t a plane, although at first i thought it was because it had flashing lights like one. one light was white, the other red, and the other blue if i remember right. it also may have had a blinking light in the middle.

i haven���t a clue how high up it was but it seemed a bit higher than the clouds and seemed not much bigger than my index finger from a distance, and it was moving about as fast as a plane. no engine sounds although that didn���t surprise me at all considering the height it appeared to be at.

i thought "cool! i'm seeing a ufo! wonder just what it is and where it came from!", but i did not (and don't) consider it a big deal, and consider it a mostly fleeting, not-too-spectacular experience. 

my assumption it was one of those spyplane things. why it had flashing, blaring lights though when it���s supposed to be spying is beyond me! but that���s what i think it may have been as we have an air force base nearby. but of course there's no way to know for sure.
content.summary: Triangular shaped ufo w/ a light in each corner and a blinking light (?).

content.detailedDescription:
Me and 2 of my friends were sitting outside of the tattoo studio i work at.When i looked up i saw the lights i had seen the previous week.I yelled to the guys "look! look in the sky over there, there it is, the lights i saw last week"! kenny and my other friend looked up and saw them too in less than a couple of seconds.
     the light were an orange/amber/yellow.They were 5 of the in the western sky.They appeared in succession.One after the other like rapping you finger on a table pinky to forefinger.Then still stationary they disappeared. only to reappear to the east of where they were a few seconds later. this is the second week in a row i've seen them.In the same general area.
content.summary: Orange/amber yellow lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I took like 50 pictures of cloud's and sky today like i do quite oftenly because they have the technology to disapear to the naked eye (they are there watching us..No dought about that)......But when i got home and downloaded in the computer i saw that egge shape disc on the right and middle....Tought you might like to see that one,,,,,i got like 30 pictures that i photograph some strange egg greyish ufo

fisrt picture its today and second one and thrid was from last year(summer time)(zoom down on the right )
content.summary: Did not see the ufo while taking picture.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the spring of 1974 while i was attending uni, in cedar falls when i saw my first ufo. i was 20 yrs old at the time, and no i hadn't been drinking alcohol, or using any illegal drugs. it was night time and i was bored and just staring out my window to the west of my dorm room in "harding house" in shull hall at uni. movement above the roof of noren (sp?) hall caught my eye, and that's when i saw the outline of a spherical ufo hovering about 10 ft above the roof. it was approx 20-25 ft in diameter, and gray in color. it had a slight hump in the middle of the craft, but didn't have any portals or windows, nor any markings to identify it. it made no sound, emitted no form of firey complusion to move it. i sat there in disbelife of what i was seeing. i just sat there and watched the craft, for the short time frame that it was present
the ufo moved slowly along the roof line, and then began to move further away to the west until out of sight. it had no lights on it, and the only way i was able to see it, was from the ambient light from the street lights. after it left, i sat down and drew a sketch of the ufo that i had seen.
approx. 6 months later i watched a documentary on ufos, and they had a picture of a ufo that fit the description of the one i had seen. including the fact that it didn't have any external lights on it.
i kept that sketch up until about 4 yrs. ago. i'm allergic to paper dust, and its' decaying paper caused me to have an allergic reaction to it, so i tossed it out.
do i believe in ufos? "yes!" but i'm sitting on the fence as to whether they are from an alien race from outspace, or just experimental aircraft from earth.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Spring of 1974 a spherical ufo hovers above uni's noehren hall.
